title: Armchair Mystery Theatre - Toff And Fingers (Colorized) (1960, suspense, imdb score: 7.8)

sources.title: Armchair Mystery Theatre - Toff And Fingers (Colorized) (1960, suspense, imdb score: 7.8)
sources.description: Armchair Mystery Theatre is a 60-minute  UK  television anthology mystery series. Thirty-four episodes aired from 1960–1965. It was hosted by  Donald Pleasence  and produced by  Leonard White . It was a spin-off from the successful  Armchair Theatre  series. Guest stars included  Edward Woodward ,   Cyril Cusack ,  Sam Wanamaker ,  Ron Moody ,  Tom Bell ,  Denholm Elliott , and  Sybil Thorndike .
